attributes.action: SAVE ABBEY HILL & PERFORMING ARTS COLLEGE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A top-performing special needs school has been told it could be shut down and replaced with a new school that will have fewer places available for the children who need their expertise.

If the closure goes ahead, ABBEY HILL School & Performing Arts College, in Bucknall, Stoke-on-Trent, would be stripped of its performing arts status, and be forced into integration/co-location with a mainstream secondary school.

The future of Abbey Hill has been tied up in a £200 million scheme to transform secondary education. 

With numerous amazing achievements to its name, the closure will be a disaster to its community and must be kept open at all costs, so please help.
